suncertify.client
Class URLyBirdModel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      suncertify.client.URLyBirdModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TableModel, RoomReservationsModel
public class URLyBirdModel
extends AbstractTableModel
implements RoomReservationsModel

Model implementation of the room reservation system's MVC design.

Author:
Oliver Hernandez
See Also:
RoomReservationsModel, AbstractTableModel, Serialized Form

bookRoom

public boolean bookRoom(int selectedRoom,
                        String customerId)
                 throws RemoteException,
                        RecordNotFoundException,
                        SecurityException
Book the hotel room at the specified row in the model.

Specified by:
bookRoom in interface RoomReservationsModel
Parameters:
selectedRoom - a zero-based row index.
customerId - the customer ID to book the room for.
Returns:
true when the room was successfully booked for the customer, false otherwise.
Throws:
RemoteException - when a network error occurs.
RecordNotFoundException - when the room has been deleted.
SecurityException - when the room was attempted to be booked by another user, or the request to book the room timed-out.

isRoomBooked

public boolean isRoomBooked(int selectedRoom)
Returns whether or not the model displayed to the view has the selected room booked. The view would show a value in the Customer ID column if the room was booked.

Specified by:
isRoomBooked in interface RoomReservationsModel
Parameters:
selectedRoom - the row index of the room selected by the view.
Returns:
true if the selected room is booked, false otherwise.
